info.senderName: Global Disaster Alert and Coordination System
info.headline: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.1M, Depth:100.49km) in Guatemala 12/10/2020 06:06 UTC, 6480000 people within 100km.
info.description: On 10/12/2020 6:06:56 AM, an earthquake occurred in Guatemala potentially affecting 6480000 people within 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 5.1M, Depth:100.49km.
